trans-unit.source: Encapsulates zero or more components.
trans-unit.target: 封裝零個或多個元件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> class is the default implementation for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>類別是預設實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>介面。

trans-unit.source: Containers are objects that encapsulate and track zero or more components.
trans-unit.target: 容器是封裝和追蹤零個或多個元件的物件。

trans-unit.source: In this context, containment refers to logical containment, not visual containment.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，內含項目是指邏輯內含項目，不是視覺化的內含項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use components and containers in a variety of scenarios, including scenarios that are both visual and not visual.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用元件和容器中的各種案例，包括已視覺化並不是視覺化的情況。

trans-unit.source: The components in a container are tracked in a first-in, first-out list, which also defines the order of the components within the container.
trans-unit.target: 在容器中的元件會追蹤在第一個在先進先出清單中，其亦會定義元件的容器內的順序。

trans-unit.source: Added components are appended to the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: 加入的元件會附加至清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 加入至 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />。

trans-unit.source: The component to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的元件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 加入至 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />。

trans-unit.source: The component is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: 元件未命名。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別可以覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is added to the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>加入至清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The component to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的元件。

trans-unit.source: The unique, case-insensitive name to assign to the component.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給元件的唯一、不區分大小寫的名稱。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" />, which leaves the component unnamed.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" />，表示沒有為元件命名。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> and assigns it a name.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 加入 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />，並指派名稱給它。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別可以覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is added to the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>加入至清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is not unique.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 不是唯一。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the components in the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 中的所有元件。

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the components in the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.
trans-unit.target: 集合，含有 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 中的元件。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別可以覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The components in the collection are stored in the same order as they were added to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的元件會儲存在相同的順序加入<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> to create a site for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其建立站台的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />。

trans-unit.source: The name to assign to <c>component</c>, or <see langword="null" /> to skip the name assignment.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給 <c>component</c> 的名稱，或 <see langword="null" /> 略過名稱指派。

trans-unit.source: Creates a site <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> for the given <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> and assigns the given name to the site.
trans-unit.target: 為指定的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> 建立站台 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />，並將指定的名稱指派給站台。

trans-unit.source: The newly created site.
trans-unit.target: 新建立的站台。

trans-unit.source: If the `name` parameter is `null`, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> without an identifying name.
trans-unit.target: 如果`name`參數是`null`、<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>加入至<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>沒有識別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別可以覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Implementers that need to override the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.CreateSite%2A> method can provide a custom implementation through a class that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> interface.
trans-unit.target: 需要覆寫的實作器<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.CreateSite%2A>方法可以提供自訂實作的類別，透過實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>介面。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 所使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A> 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A> 方法會將 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A>，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>所佔用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>.
trans-unit.target: 在您釋放最後一個 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Dispose%2A> 參考之前，請務必呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 釋出 Unmanaged 資源並執行其他清除作業後，記憶體回收才能重新回收 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Finalize 方法和解構函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之服務的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the service object of the specified type, if it is available.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定型別的服務物件 (如果有的話)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> implementing the requested service, or <see langword="null" /> if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 實作要求服務的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，或 <see langword="null" /> (如果無法解析服務)。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method returns the current instance of the class if `service` is an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>; otherwise, it returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個方法的預設實作會傳回類別的目前執行個體`service`是<xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>; 否則它會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to provide a custom implementation to return a service object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫這個方法以提供自訂的實作，以傳回服務物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The component to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的元件。

trans-unit.source: Removes a component from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 移除元件。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別可以覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The component to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的元件。

trans-unit.source: Removes a component from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> without setting <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site" /> to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Container" /> 移除元件，而不必將 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site" /> 設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.RemoveWithoutUnsiting%2A> method cleans up the site as usual, but it does not set the component's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.RemoveWithoutUnsiting%2A>方法清除網站像往常一樣，但不會設定元件的<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>屬性`null`。

trans-unit.source: The named component.
trans-unit.target: 具名元件。

trans-unit.source: The component name to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的元件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the component name is unique for this container.
trans-unit.target: 判斷元件名稱對這個容器而言是否唯一。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.ValidateName%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Add%2A> method to determine if the name of the `component` being added is unique for this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.ValidateName%2A>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container.Add%2A>方法來判斷名稱`component`正在加入的是唯一的這<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>。

trans-unit.source: If the `name` parameter is not `null` and is not unique, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`name`參數不是`null`而且不是唯一的<xref:System.ArgumentException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is not unique.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 不是唯一。
